#summary Example commands and tasks GoogleCL can do.
#labels Featured
Also see the [Manual] and the [SystemRequirements]

==Blogger==
  * {{{google.py blogger post --tags "GoogleCL, awesome" --title "Test Post" "I'm posting from the command line"}}}
  * {{{google.py blogger post blogpost.txt}}}
  * {{{google.py blogger list title,url-site # List posts}}}
  * {{{google.py blogger delete --title "Test Post"}}}
  * {{{google.py delete --title "Silly post number [0-9]*" # Delete posts matching regex}}}
  * {{{google.py tag --title "Dev post" --tags "Python, software" # label an existing post}}}

==Calendar==
  * {{{google.py calendar add "Dinner party with George today at 6pm" # add event to calendar}}}
  * {{{google.py calendar today # List events for today only. }}}
  * {{{google.py calendar list --date 2010-06-01,2010-06-30 # List events.}}}
  * {{{google.py calendar delete --title "Dinner party with George" # Delete an event.}}}

==Contacts==
  * {{{google.py contacts add "J. Random Hacker, jrandom@example.com"}}}
  * {{{google.py contacts list name,email --title "J. Random Hacker"}}}
  * {{{google.py contacts delete --title "J. Random Hacker"}}}


==Docs==
  * Note: requires gdata 2.0 or later
  * {{{google.py docs delete --title "Evidence"}}}
  * {{{google.py docs edit --title "Shopping list" --editor vim}}}
  * {{{google.py docs get --title "Homework [0-9]*"}}}
  * {{{google.py docs list title,url-direct --delimiter ": " # list docs}}}
  * {{{google.py docs upload the_bobs.csv ~/work/docs_to_share/*}}}

==Picasa==
  * {{{google.py picasa create --title "Vermont Test" --tags Vermont vermont.jpg}}}
  * {{{google.py picasa get --title "Vermont Test" /path/to/download/folder}}}
  * {{{google.py picasa list title,url-direct --query "A tag"}}}
  * {{{google.py picasa post --title "Vermont Test" ~/old_photos/*.jpg # Add to an album}}}
  * {{{google.py picasa tag --title "Vermont Test" --tags "places"}}}
  * {{{google.py picasa delete --title "Vermont Test" # delete entire album}}}

==Youtube==
  * {{{google.py youtube post --category Education --devtags GoogleCL killer_robots.avi}}}
  * {{{google.py youtube delete --title "killer_robots.avi"}}}
  * {{{google.py youtube list # list my videos}}}
  * {{{google.py youtube tag -n ".*robot.*" --tags robot}}}
